title: A new strategy in Blood Moon and it is no fun what so ever to be up against in Blood Moon.
body:
As the title says...

Not allowing your enemy team to even get points, remain grouped at all time, kill everyone and kill everyone trying to get the spirit/herald.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2582900955/235339808?tab=overview

They did not get any spirits what so ever; they only killed us over and over; it did not give us a chance to react.

This is basically the same thing as the tank thingy in Ascension; I find this is an unfair advantage that should be addressed ASAP.

replies.body: Uhh, what? Kills are actually one of the objectives of this mode, and the gold gain is almost static, so if you guys weren't able to kill them back, that's on you. It's not like they weren't actually getting points themselves.

So you're saying the other team just grouped up and this is unfair and not fun?

Sounds like you just got riggity rekt by the other team and are salty. I thought the point was to murder the other team, screw spirits. The most anti-fun team I played against had an Ahri, Zed and Shaco who refused to fight anyone all game, just killed spirits. If you got anywhere near them they just dashed over a wall and ran away.

Best games are where everyone congregates around Rift Heralds and just goes at it.

How are you losing to that tactic?  You should be free farming their spirits.  If they send 2 to kill someone on the other side of the map, what are the other 4 people on your team doing? They could be 4v3ing.  

I wish the enemy team tried to group as 5 all game, it sounds like a free win.

Yet another match...
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2583500644/235339808?tab=overview

The main purpose is to only kill in Blood Moon early, making it impossible to even catch up to the enemy team.

Kills earn more points; they remain grouped and kill you over and over. After they have enough points, it is too late to catch up and nearly impossible to even win the game from them.

It is basically a one-sided strategy that needs to be addressed ASAP.
yeah the difference is that game is going to end at some point. also lol you guys really couldnt kill them.

? What? are you saying they 5 man grouped at all times?


If so that means yall were trying to fight back cause there's no way they can stop you from splitting being grouped as 5.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xuklKzjy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T01:11:23.973+0000)
>
> ? What? are you saying they 5 man grouped at all times?
> 
> 
> If so that means yall were trying to fight back cause there's no way they can stop you from splitting being grouped as 5.

We tried to split up to capture the spirits, they pretty much, while still grouped in a way (group as two to pick off the splitter, etc.), just went to you and kill you.

We tried to fight back as a group... But that did not work very well.

Another match with this strategy.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2582953722/235339808?tab=overview

They remained group, but this time camped our Nexus, so we barely couldn't do anything but to die to them.

Sadly, by doing this strategy, it ruins the fun in playing the Blood Moon game. I don't want a random game mode that is all we do - die and die repeatedly without any sort of counter.

We were lucky to even get a herald and some kills.
